text: MBC Bollywood is a channel member with the MBC Group, launched in 2013 to provide distinguished content with a new entertainment dimension, represented by the latest and well known Bollywood cinematic productions, in addition to a mix of daily series and leading programs about the Indian subcontinent, its well known people and its latest works. The channel caters to a wide range of viewers in the Middle East and North Africa, through a rich programming lineup that includes Bollywood movies and series dubbed or subtitled into Arabic. == TV series == === Indian series === Dubbing of all Indian series is in Arabic. * Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2 * Bahu Bagum * Beintehaa Naved Aslam & Rituraj Singh in Beintehaa - TOI * Bepannah * Beyhadh * Beyhadh 2 * Chittod Ki Rani Padmini Ka Johur * Dangerous * Dil Hi Toh Hai * Dil Toh Happy Hai Ji * Ek Deewaana Tha * Ek Hasina Thi * Ek Bhram Sarvagun Sampanna * Ek Duje Ke Vaaste * The Empire * Farah Ki Dawat * Gathbandhan * Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin * The Great Indian Global Kitchen * The Great Indian Murder * Ishk Par Zor Nahi * Ishq Mein Marjawan * Ishq Mein Marjawan 2 * Ishqbaaaz * Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon? * Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon 3 * Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon? with Vogue * Bollywood's Most Desirables * Bollywood Shuffle * Bollywood Café * Bollyworld * Breakfast To Dinner * Beauty Pulse * Citruss TV * Get The Look * IIFA Buzz * The Love Laugh Live Show * My Yellow Table * Style Addict * This is My Story === Indian talk shows === Subtitling of all Indian talk shows is in Arabic. * The Anupam Kher Show – Kucch Bhi Ho Sakta Hai * Koffee with Karan * Simi Rajkumar * Rocky Handsome * Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety * Super 30 * Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara * Laaga Chunari Mein Daag == Competitors == The competition is linked to broadcasting on the same satellites directed to the Arab world, especially the Nilesat satellite, which carries all the competing channels specializing in Indian films and programs. === Competing channels === * Zee Aflam * Zee Alwan * B4U Aflam * B4U Plus * Imagine Movies == References == == Other websites == * Official website of MBC Group Category:Bollywood Category:2013
